description.displayText:
Edana is wonderful. She arrived to her interview on time and had a great positive energetic vibe that I loved so much I decided to hire her on the spot. I explained things around the house and she was showing initiative and enthusiasm. I hired her to help me clean my apartment in between guests during the summer. She came to do a deep cleaning of kitchen and bathroom and I was so impressed. Edana CLEANS. She is quick, professional, and she knows how to get around the house. I will keep hiring her after the summer as well and I couldn't recommend her enough!! 
Thank you Edana !!! 
__
